questions.quote: Oh my God. That man over there. I think he's wearing glasses that look just like Jake's. Pull over, stop the car.  Here, here. I think I got a way of getting back at my ex-boyfriend.
Huh? Well, I'm gettin' out of town. I'm gonna visit Madeline for the weekend. You know, this place is lookin' kinda messy. What happened to Cindy?
Hi. I'm your neighbour, uh, fr... from across the street. And uh,  I was wondering, if it wouldn't be too much trouble, if I could use your apartment to order some food?
Oh!  Heeeyy! Well, ladies and gentlemen! It's our good friend, George Costanza! What a surprise!
George, Festivus is your heritage - it's part of who you are.
it's in my book - "Astonishing Tales of the Sea" 51 people died.
Mattress, I didn't order a mattress. Who sent this? Hal Kitzmiller?
Yeah! In fact, she broke up with me! And I don't want to talk about it!
No, noâ€¦time! It's all this meaningless time. Laundry, grocery, shopping, coming in here talking to you. Do you have any idea how much time I waste in this apartment?
No problem. Yeah, you'll have the whole thing installed by the time you get back.
